name: Hokan Group, Inc.
description: Provider of insurance management tool intended to assist maintenance service for insurance recruiters. The company's tool analyzes insurance policies and offers recommendations that can create charts, graphs, and other visual representations of the provided data of contracts and documents, enabling insurance agents to automatically digitize the information and manage the policy documents.
